page.title: 03LIFE STYLES
page.content: IN THE CLASS WE ASKED 42% OF FAMILIES HAD VIDEOS.ALMOST THE SAME AMOUNT OF LPEOPLE HAD FRIDGES AND FREEZERS,BUT THERE IS A LITTLE DIFFERENCE FRIDGES 92% AND FREEZERS 75%.DISHWASHERS ARE THE LEAST COMMON APPLIANCE AT 3%.MOST PEOPLE HAD GASCOOKERS BUT SOME PEOPLE DID HAVE ELECTRIC,GAS 52% ELECTRIC 40% 51% FAMILIES HAVE SHOWER UNITS.HIFI OR MUSICCENTRES ARE JUST COMING IN,62% OF FAMILIES HAVE THEM.A LOT OF PEOPLE HAD A HOOVER AT 92%.OVER HALF THE PEOPLE HAD TUMBLE DRIERS AT 53% HOME COMPUTERS ARE GOING OUT NOW BUT 27% HAD THEM.45% HAD FOODMIXERS.35% HAD ELECTRIC FIRES. WE THINK THE REST HAD CENTRAL HEATING. 45% HAD ELECTRIC RAZORS.58% OF FAMILIES HAD PORTABLE STEREO RADIOS.
